c74object.name: abc.audiotester~
c74object.description: abc.audiotester~ enables to test the audio configuration from 1 to 64 loudspeakers by sending a pink noise alternatively to them at a certain frequency.

attribute.name: nls
attribute.description: sets the number of loudspeakers to test[init=2:min=1:max=64:step=1].
attribute.digest: sets the number of loudspeakers to test

attribute.name: freq
attribute.description: sets the frequency of the alternance between speakers. [init=1:min=0.01:max=100:step=0.01].
attribute.digest: sets the frequency of the alternance between speakers

attribute.name: gain
attribute.description: sets the output gain in dB [init=0:min=-127:max=18:step=0.01].
attribute.digest: sets the output gain in dB

method.name: n
method.description: sets the number of loudspeakers to test[init=2:min=1:max=64:step=1].
method.digest: sets the number of loudspeakers to test

method.name: freq
method.description: sets the frequency of the alternance between speakers. [init=1:min=0.01:max=100:step=0.01].
method.digest: sets the frequency of the alternance between speakers

method.name: gain
method.description: sets the output gain in dB [init=0:min=-127:max=18:step=0.01].
method.digest: sets the output gain in dB
